blocks.legend: ACME provides a wide range of solutions catering to all stages of the production line.

blocks.name: block-2
blocks.title: Acme understands special demands of the food and beverage field: highly reliable products designed for the strictest hygiene requirements.
blocks.text: Acme components and solutions are able to adapt to aggressive environments and regular wash-downs with ease. Palletisation and de-palletisation solutions catering to Food & Beverage are Acme's expertise.
